subject: Suits and Litigation
Steroids
Libel and Slander
organizations: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Texas dismissed a portion of a defamation lawsuit filed by Roger Clemens against his chief accuser and former trainer, Brian McNamee.
snippet: A federal judge in Texas dismissed a portion of a defamation lawsuit filed by Roger Clemens against his chief accuser and former trainer, Brian McNamee.
